Text: despite the enlightening view on how little regard the us government has for their soldiers, this is a bleeding heart testament to the bad guys. who gives a fuck what happened to the 'good guys' who didnt get treatment compared to the effect of 2 million kilograms of radioactive material spread through a nations terrain. Clever genocide. Long Term effects. fuck these dumbass grunts, think about a whole area of land whose people will be poisoned for years and years. still. worth a tank and a think. but fuck it. insanity prevails.
